verses.verse: לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not לָ֥נוּ יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Not unto us O LORD לֹ֫א <S%H3808><s%> not לָ֥נוּ כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> But לְ֭שִׁמְךָ <S%H8034><s%> not unto us but unto thy name תֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> give כָּב֑וֹד <S%H3519><s%> glory עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> Because חַ֝סְדְּךָ֗ <S%H2617><s%> for thy mercy עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> because אֲמִתֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H571><s%> [and] for thy truth's
לָ֭מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why יֹאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> say הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> Wherefore should the heathen אַיֵּה־ <S%H346><s%> Where נָ֝֗א <S%H4994><s%> now אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> angels

וֵֽאלֹהֵ֥ינוּ <S%H430><s%> But our God בַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> [is] in the heavens כֹּ֭ל <S%H3605><s%> all manner אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> he חָפֵ֣ץ <S%H2654><s%> whatsoever he hath pleased עָשָֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> he hath done
עֲ‍ֽ֭צַבֵּיהֶם <S%H6091><s%> Their idols כֶּ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> [are] silver וְזָהָ֑ב <S%H2091><s%> and gold מַ֝עֲשֵׂ֗ה <S%H4639><s%> the work יְדֵ֣י <S%H3027><s%> hands אָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> of men's

פֶּֽה־ <S%H6310><s%> They have mouths לָ֭הֶם <S%H1992><s%> they וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> cannot יְדַבֵּ֑רוּ <S%H1696><s%> but they speak עֵינַ֥יִם <S%H5869><s%> not eyes לָ֝הֶ֗ם <S%H1992><s%> they וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> cannot יִרְאֽוּ׃ <S%H7200><s%> have they but they see

אָזְנַ֣יִם <S%H241><s%> They have ears לָ֭הֶם וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> cannot יִשְׁמָ֑עוּ <S%H8085><s%> but they hear אַ֥ף <S%H639><s%> not noses לָ֝הֶ֗ם וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> cannot יְרִיחֽוּן׃ <S%H7306><s%> have they but they smell

יְדֵיהֶ֤ם ׀ <S%H3027><s%> They have hands וְלֹ֬א <S%H3808><s%> cannot יְמִישׁ֗וּן <S%H4184><s%> but they handle רַ֭גְלֵיהֶם <S%H7272><s%> not feet וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> cannot יְהַלֵּ֑כוּ <S%H1980><s%> have they but they walk לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> cannot יֶ֝הְגּ֗וּ <S%H1897><s%> not neither speak בִּגְרוֹנָֽם׃ <S%H1627><s%> they through their throat

כְּ֭מוֹהֶם <S%H3644><s%> like יִהְי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> will become עֹשֵׂיהֶ֑ם <S%H6213><s%> They that make כֹּ֭ל <S%H3605><s%> Everyone אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who בֹּטֵ֣חַ <S%H982><s%> them are like unto them [so is] every one that trusteth בָּהֶֽם׃

יִ֭שְׂרָאֵל <S%H3478><s%> O Israel בְּטַ֣ח <S%H982><s%> trust בַּיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> thou in the LORD עֶזְרָ֖ם <S%H5828><s%> he [is] their help וּמָגִנָּ֣ם <S%H4043><s%> and their shield הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> O

בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> O house אַ֭הֲרֹן <S%H175><s%> of Aaron בִּטְח֣וּ <S%H982><s%> trust בַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD עֶזְרָ֖ם <S%H5828><s%> he [is] their help וּמָגִנָּ֣ם <S%H4043><s%> and their shield הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> that

יִרְאֵ֣י <S%H3373><s%> Ye that fear יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בִּטְח֣וּ <S%H982><s%> trust בַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD עֶזְרָ֖ם <S%H5828><s%> he [is] their help וּמָגִנָּ֣ם <S%H4043><s%> and their shield הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD זְכָרָ֪נוּ <S%H2142><s%> hath been mindful יְבָ֫רֵ֥ךְ <S%H1288><s%> of us he will bless יְ֭בָרֵךְ <S%H1288><s%> [us] he will bless אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel יְ֝בָרֵ֗ךְ <S%H1288><s%> he will bless אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> the house אַהֲרֹֽן׃ <S%H175><s%> of Aaron

יְ֭בָרֵךְ <S%H1288><s%> He will bless יִרְאֵ֣י <S%H3373><s%> them that fear יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הַ֝קְּטַנִּ֗ים <S%H6996><s%> [both] small עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> together הַגְּדֹלִֽים׃ <S%H1419><s%> and great

יֹסֵ֣ף <S%H3254><s%> shall increase יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD עֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H5921><s%> and עֲ֝לֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H5921><s%> and וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and בְּנֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1121><s%> you more and more you and your children

בְּרוּכִ֣ים <S%H1288><s%> Ye [are] blessed אַ֭תֶּם <S%H859><s%> you לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עֹ֝שֵׂ֗ה <S%H6213><s%> which made שָׁמַ֥יִם <S%H8064><s%> heaven וָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> and earth

הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> The heaven שָׁ֭מַיִם <S%H8064><s%> [even] the heavens לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> [are] the LORD'S וְ֝הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> but the earth נָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> hath he given לִבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> to the children אָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> of men

לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor הַ֭מֵּתִים <S%H4191><s%> The dead יְהַֽלְלוּ־ <S%H1984><s%> praise יָ֑הּ <S%H3050><s%> not the LORD וְ֝לֹ֗א <S%H3808><s%> Nor כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any יֹרְדֵ֥י <S%H3381><s%> neither any that go down דוּמָֽה׃ <S%H1745><s%> into silence

וַאֲנַ֤חְנוּ ׀ <S%H587><s%> we נְבָ֘רֵ֤ךְ <S%H1288><s%> But we will bless יָ֗הּ <S%H3050><s%> the LORD מֵֽעַתָּ֥ה <S%H6258><s%> this וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> from this time forth and for עוֹלָ֗ם <S%H5769><s%> evermore הַֽלְלוּ־ <S%H1984><s%> Praise יָֽהּ׃ <S%H3050><s%> the LORD
